Detailed Description

Overlap computations for rectangles.

Function Documentation

lay_real_t lay_overlap_area (  const lay_coord_t *  pos1,
const lay_extent_t *  size1,
const lay_coord_t *  pos2,
const lay_extent_t *  size2,
lay_real_t *  grad
) 
 

Compute the overlap area between two rectangles.

If grad is non-null, then the gradient is saved as an array of four real values, calculated with respect to rect1.x, to rect1.y, to rect2.x, and to rect2.y, in that order.
